title: Family, Bride, Domestic Help: The Toll Of Israeli Strikes On Lebanon
content: Israel says Monday's strikes targeted Hezbollah weapons. Lebanon's health ministry said the attacks left more than 550 people dead, including at least 50 children and 98 women, in Lebanon's bloodiest day since the end of the 1975-90 Civil War.
summary: Israel says Monday's strikes targeted Hezbollah weapons. Lebanon's health ministry said the attacks left more than 550 people dead, including at least 50 children and 98 women, in Lebanon's bloodiest day since the end of the 1975-90 Civil War.

title: NASA Pushes Back Crew-9 Mission Launch To Saturday Due To Tropical Storm
content: NASA said on Tuesday the launch of its Crew-9 mission with SpaceX has been pushed back to Sept. 28 due to Tropical Storm Helene.
summary: NASA said on Tuesday the launch of its Crew-9 mission with SpaceX has been pushed back to Sept. 28 due to Tropical Storm Helene.

title: Key US Muslim Advocacy Group Endorses Harris, Says Trump Bigger Danger
content: US Muslim advocacy group Emgage Action on Wednesday endorsed Democratic presidential candidate Kamala Harris, saying former President Donald Trump posed a greater danger to the community.
summary: US Muslim advocacy group Emgage Action on Wednesday endorsed Democratic presidential candidate Kamala Harris, saying former President Donald Trump posed a greater danger to the community.

title: Putin Issues Nuclear Warning To West In Response To "Massive" Air Attack
content: Vladimir Putin today issued a nuclear warning to the West in the event that there is a "massive" air attack on Russia. This includes the use of cruise missiles which the UK has supplied to Ukraine for Kyiv to target locations within Russian territory
summary: Vladimir Putin today issued a nuclear warning to the West in the event that there is a "massive" air attack on Russia. This includes the use of cruise missiles which the UK has supplied to Ukraine for Kyiv to target locations within Russian territory

title: Explosion At Courthouse In California, Suspect Arrested: Report
content: Authorities were responding on Wednesday to a reported explosion at the Santa Maria Courthouse in California, according to the Santa Barbara County Sheriff's Office amid reports that a suspect was in custody.
summary: Authorities were responding on Wednesday to a reported explosion at the Santa Maria Courthouse in California, according to the Santa Barbara County Sheriff's Office amid reports that a suspect was in custody.

title: "We Feel Their Pain": Gazans Stunned By Israeli Strikes On Lebanon
content: As Israeli bombs flattened buildings and sent smoke billowing skywards over Lebanon this week, Gazans looked on with both empathy and fear over how the widening war might affect them.
summary: As Israeli bombs flattened buildings and sent smoke billowing skywards over Lebanon this week, Gazans looked on with both empathy and fear over how the widening war might affect them.

title: France Mass Rape Defendants Reluctantly Admit No Consent
content: Two defendants in a mass rape trial that has shocked France on Wednesday reluctantly admitted they had raped a man's heavily sedated wife as they had not sought her consent.
summary: Two defendants in a mass rape trial that has shocked France on Wednesday reluctantly admitted they had raped a man's heavily sedated wife as they had not sought her consent.

title: Biden Warns "All Out War" Possible In Middle East
content: US President Joe Biden warned Wednesday of the possibility of an "all-out war" in the Middle East but said he was hopeful a settlement was still achievable for the conflict-torn region.
summary: US President Joe Biden warned Wednesday of the possibility of an "all-out war" in the Middle East but said he was hopeful a settlement was still achievable for the conflict-torn region.

title: Israel Army Chief Puts Troops On Alert For "Possible Entry" Into Lebanon
content: Israel's army chief told troops on Wednesday to be prepared for a "possible entry" into Lebanon as Israeli fighter jets bombarded Hezbollah targets across the border.
summary: Israel's army chief told troops on Wednesday to be prepared for a "possible entry" into Lebanon as Israeli fighter jets bombarded Hezbollah targets across the border.

title: "World Has Evolved Yet UN Remains A Prisoner Of The Past": S Jaishankar
content: Asserting that the United Nations remains a "prisoner" of the past, External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar said countries of the Global South cannot continue to be "short-changed".
summary: Asserting that the United Nations remains a "prisoner" of the past, External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar said countries of the Global South cannot continue to be "short-changed".

title: In A 1st, China Operates All 3 Aircraft Carriers At Once, Near Japan, Taiwan
content: The Chinese People's Liberation Army Navy (PLAN) reportedly operated its three aircraft carriers for exercises or tests over the past week for the first time.
summary: The Chinese People's Liberation Army Navy (PLAN) reportedly operated its three aircraft carriers for exercises or tests over the past week for the first time.

title: Putin's 'Top Secret' Meet Over Nukes As Ukraine Plans Cruise Missile Attack
content: Vladimir Putin called for an urgent meeting of Moscow's top security council to discuss its nuclear deterrence. The move comes amid concerns in Russia over Ukraine being allowed by Western powers to use cruise missiles to target locations in Russia.
summary: Vladimir Putin called for an urgent meeting of Moscow's top security council to discuss its nuclear deterrence. The move comes amid concerns in Russia over Ukraine being allowed by Western powers to use cruise missiles to target locations in Russia.

title: "In Some Areas, No City, Village Spared": Lebanese Witness On Israel Strikes
content: No city or village in certain areas has been spared in the Israeli strikes on Lebanon in which over 500 civilians, including 50 children have been killed, a resident of Beirut has told NDTV, claiming that citizens are standing with Hezbollah.
summary: No city or village in certain areas has been spared in the Israeli strikes on Lebanon in which over 500 civilians, including 50 children have been killed, a resident of Beirut has told NDTV, claiming that citizens are standing with Hezbollah.

title: China Firm Fires Employee For Refusing To Buy Breakfast For Boss
content: Lou recounted how her supervisor demanded she bring her a hot Americano and an egg every morning, as well as keep a bottle of water readily available.
summary: Lou recounted how her supervisor demanded she bring her a hot Americano and an egg every morning, as well as keep a bottle of water readily available.

title: S Korean Vlogger Claims To Have Aborted Baby At 9 Months, Probe Underway
content: A South Korean vlogger has courted controversy after claiming that she terminated her pregnancy at nine months.
summary: A South Korean vlogger has courted controversy after claiming that she terminated her pregnancy at nine months.

title: 4 Indian-Origin Men Charged For Abusing Cop In Singapore
content: A nearly two-minute video of the four abusing the police officer at a crime scene was uploaded on Facebook.
summary: A nearly two-minute video of the four abusing the police officer at a crime scene was uploaded on Facebook.

title: Musk Reacts After Vinod Khosla Demands Apology For Spreading False Claims
content: Prominent Indian-American businessman Vinod Khosla and billionaire Elon Musk had a public war of words over a land battle in California and an allegedly altered image of a sign on a beach.
summary: Prominent Indian-American businessman Vinod Khosla and billionaire Elon Musk had a public war of words over a land battle in California and an allegedly altered image of a sign on a beach.

title: The Tragic Tale Of 2 West Bank Teenagers Freed In Gaza Truce
content: Newly freed from an Israeli prison, Wael Masha rode atop friends' shoulders through the streets of his West Bank refugee camp before bursting into his home to kiss his mother's feet.
summary: Newly freed from an Israeli prison, Wael Masha rode atop friends' shoulders through the streets of his West Bank refugee camp before bursting into his home to kiss his mother's feet.

title: MIT Students Disrupt Israeli Professor's Talk, Steal Pizza in Bizarre Protest
content: The professor expressed frustration, stating that "facts don't matter to them" and that the students were reciting pre-determined statements rather than engaging with his actual account.
summary: The professor expressed frustration, stating that "facts don't matter to them" and that the students were reciting pre-determined statements rather than engaging with his actual account.

title: US Rapper Sean 'Diddy' Mercilessly Raped Woman After Drugging Her: Lawsuit
content: Music mogul Sean Combs, also known as Diddy, and his former bodyguard drugged and violently raped a woman in 2001 and filmed the act to show it to his friends, according to a new lawsuit against him.
summary: Music mogul Sean Combs, also known as Diddy, and his former bodyguard drugged and violently raped a woman in 2001 and filmed the act to show it to his friends, according to a new lawsuit against him.
